    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(GameLevel level)
        Creates a new game with the specified level. Default width and height are used.
        Parameters:
        level - The level to initiate the game with.

      • Game

        public Game(GameLevel level,
            int canvasWidth,
            int canvasHeight)
        Creates a new game with the specified level, with the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        level - The GameLevel.
        canvasWidth - The canvas width.
        canvasHeight - The canvas height.
